games.Name: Mannequin
games.About:
คุณจะได้รับบทเป็นพนักงานร้านเสื้อผ้าที่กำลังจะจบงานและเตรียมตัวกลับบ้าน อย่างไรก็ตาม เมื่อคุณกำลังเดินทางไปที่ประตูออก ไฟดับโดยฉับพลัน ทำให้คุณต้องอยู่ในร้านนี้

พยายามรอดชีวิตในขณะที่คุณเดินไปทั่วในร้านและพยายามหาทางออกจากสถานการณ์นี้ แต่มันก็ไม่ง่ายขนาดนั้น 

ถ้าอยากรู้ว่าเพราะอะไร ลองเข้าไปดูกันได้เลยในเกม

games.Name: BROKEN THROUGH
games.About:
7 years ago, your best friend Leo Williams mysteriously disappeared, and no one had the slightest clue where he went.



Seven years after this incident, Leo was declared dead since no one could find him.



And now you are in possession of his belongings.



But something about his stuff seems off...



Something says he's still out there.



And many more too.



BROKEN THROUGH
Broken Through is a full length psychological story rich horror game experience that blends terrifying scenarios with dreamish visuals combined with a nostalgic retro theme.

 Wander through this world with caution at all time.

 There’s more than what meets the eye.

games.Name: Mr. Lupin
games.About: On a wonderful winter night, the moonlight bathes the silent streets, your own footsteps echoing softly. But wait... did you just hear someone whispering your name?

games.Name: The Final Pin
games.About:
THE FINAL PIN
"The Final Pin" is a full length story based game with voice acting and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat. 

You'll need to use your investigative skills and survival instincts to navigate the treacherous world of the crow killer and uncover the truth behind the town's dark past.

 Each step you take is a closer step into the darkness.

games.Name: Pumpkin Panic
games.About:
COME TO THIS COZY FARM!
Explore this little farm in the middle of the forest, plant crops, take care of the plants, go fishing, or whatever you prefer, but have a good time!

But be carefull, they say that strange things are happening in the area...

games.Name: The Lies We Tell Ourselves - Demo
games.About:
A SUPERNATURAL STORY OF CHANCE...
In this captivating tale, you'll step into the shoes of Vincent Arno, a young man who has consciously embraced a life of comfort and convenience. Shielded by the sanctuary of his parents' home, Vincent drifts through each day, unburdened by responsibilities or aspirations.
Yet, beneath a surface of self-proclaimed goodness, Vincent's indifference to his own stagnant existence begins to crumble when a mysterious presence starts questioning his true nature.

games.Name: LAUGHTER IN THE FOREST 2
games.About: LAUGHTER IN THE FOREST 2 is a continuation of a short horror game that has gathered a large number of people around it, a new part can immerse you in a completely new atmosphere and give a lot of emotions. The game can be played on 3 endings.

games.Name: Out of Gas
games.About:
OUT OF GAS is a short horror game about a person driving his car going camping in the woods. Suddenly he runs out of gas...after walking he discover that there is a gas station nearby but...the closest way to it is through the woods...and night is coming.

Inspired by SOMETHING IN THE WOODS by mik

Average playtime: 10 minutes.
Comments: ทำไมฉันมาอยู่ที่นี้

games.Name: Something In The Well
games.About:
Something In The Well
June 25th 1983, this is when it began.


Something stirs in the backwoods of Montana. 

It starts slowly, almost unnoticeable against the sounds
of untamed wilderness.

But one night, there can be no doubt:



Something is outside, trying to get in. 



A short 5-10 minute horror game with 2 endings.

games.Name: The Street
games.About:
ในขณะที่คุณกำลังขับรถผ่านถนนเส้นหนึ่งที่ไม่คุ้นชินในเวลา
ตอนกลางคืน จู่ๆรถของคุณก็ดันเสียโดยที่ไม่ทราบสาเหตุ เหตุการณ์แบบนี้เคยเกิดขึ้นกับคุณหรือไม่ เกมนี้จะมาจำลอง
สถานะการณ์ถ้าหากว่ารถของคุณเสียบนถนนเปี่ยวๆในยามดึก
ที่ไม่มีรถคันใดขับผ่านมาเลย ในระหว่างที่คุณกำลังเดินไปเรื่อยๆเพื่อขอความช่วยเหลือ ก็มีเสียงบางสิ่งที่เหมือนว่าจะตามคุณมาเจ้าสิ่งนั้นมันคืออะไร ถ้าอยากรู้แล้วละก็ เข้าไปหาคำตอบกันในเกมที่มีชื่อว่า  The Street

games.Name: Maid of Sker Survival game
games.About:
Google users
Maid of Sker is a 2020 first-person survival horror game developed and published by Wales Interactive. The game is set in 1898 in the Sker Hotel, on an imaginary island called Sker Island
